attributes.action: Keep The Former National Express East Coast In Public Ownership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As National Express East Coast (NXEC) have failed to meet the terms of their Franchise Agreement, That the Government Will Take over the Operations of NXEC When They Default on Their Contractual Obligations. That The new Public Operator Be Allowed to Run The Services Until The End of The Franchise Contract Had NXEC Not Defaulted and/or Beyond rather than The Immediate Re-franchising of the Route to another company so as to Maximise The Benefit and Enable The Taxpayer to get a better deal from a new operator than may be possible in the Current Financial Climate

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
